content.label: This is a really great game. Can you add in a sandbox mode so there’s unlimited money and you can do whatever you want (like make your own custom consoles and you have all the topics). That’ll be awesome

title.label: This game is not that great for the money

content.label: I just got this game and ive gone bankrupt like 10 times now its so hard to get a foot hold when the game is based in the 80's and theres no way to make good games when everyone is giving bad reviews on yourr game and another thing is 8grand every month is a bit steep when you're first starting off in the garage like what is the 8 grand being put twords for montly keeps? I can see the games idea but it just doesnt sit well with me the way it is now id rather get my money back but sadly thats not a way

title.label: Outstanding Game. * Suggestions for a New One*

content.label: I Love Game Dev. Tycoon. I have been playing it since it’s came out. I feel it’s one of the best games on the App Store or any App Store and I would love to see more of it. Maybe try Improving the story just a little bit making the coworkers more interactive. I know you guys have suggestions on a new game maybe a sequel to this one and I know people really don’t listen to fans all that well but I feel you guys are totally different. I suggest that you make a simulation game like this one but themed off of the music industry and have artist record tracks and releasing them. Making them interactive with their CEO a lot, and I think this could be the perfect second game for you guys to come off of. But anyways love you guys and can’t wait to see more of what you do cause I will definitely be right behind to support you. ❤️

This game truly has nothing that can compare to it. Amazing from start to finish and infinite amounts of  of possibilities. Definitely a 10/10 or even morr.
Amazing game!!

content.label: I love everything about this game, from the research to hardware development. I only have one problem with custom consoles, and trying to figure out how they work. I make more action games than anything, yet all the time my custom console is terrible with action games

I’m only adding 1 star because I’m currently bored with it. I apologize for this but I feel that there should be more content in this game, such as more technology and being able to open up more companies. Even with new updates the game is still lacking in things to do. Maybe things like getting more employees of using your money for other things or being able to expand to other locations could be added. The game right now is fun but very limited in what you can do. I want to be able to branch out. Like charities to use my huge amounts of money or funding stuff. Cause I just have insane amounts of money right now

I hope that games like Game Dev Tycoon can put a stop to trashy games and dominate the market!

This game is great but it’s over to quickly and It is also to easy. After 20 minutes I had 20 million dollars and no way to go bankrupt. I also hate how after awhile the whole game kinda stops. Their is no more consoles, or upgrades, or even topics.
All I am trying to say is that it’s a great game but It needs more love attention and time put to it.

title.label: All Games: Played it for days

content.label:
This game is amazing, and I’m surprised that this isn’t on the top 10 paid apps, but this game needs some fixes and additions, 1: this game is really grindy and fries my brain after play for an hour as well as difficult, it would be nice if there was an Infinite money/ research mode, (Sandbox/etc also, took 2 tries to get the upgraded building. 2: The star rating system is messed up, really badly, I’ll get a 6 star rating, but technically, I only got a 3 star rating, maybe improve the rating system (ex. 2.5 instead of 5 stars), if you don’t understand what I’m saying, it’s that the rating says it’s 10, but it’s actually only 5 stars

Thanks for listening to me rant

-Random Person
I bought the game on PC and loved it so much that when I saw it on mobile for $5 I basically yelled “shut up and take my money!”

title.label: One of the best games I’ve played

content.label: Amazing game, this has been worked on for quite some time by the best developers, with the computer version allowing modding, you couldn’t ask for more. The game feels amazing, and love the style of it, and the controls work really well for a touchscreen, so the only reason I’m not going 5 stars is because of the game not working well with my screen, having parts clip out when they go “under” the cameras indent, or clipped by the rounded edges.
Please add a name generator. I spend more time on a name for the games than I do making them.

Es el mejor juego tycoon de la historia de móviles, es un juego muy completo y realista, tiene consolas de nueva generación y antigua generación. Merece la pena cada centavo gastado, es un juego que te engancha durante horas. Mi parte favorita es cuando la empresa está en banca rota, eso le añade realismo al juego. Le daría más estrella pero no se puede (1,000,000/5).
